scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.compile: npm run data && harp compile src dist
scripts.dev: npm run start & npm run watch-data & npm run watch
scripts.publish: npm run build && bin/publish && npm run clean
scripts.shipit: npm run test && git push origin head
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run clean
scripts.watch-data: nodemon --watch src/_data.coffee --exec coffee bin/coffee2json src/_data.coffee src/_data.json
